analysed_sst_metadata.name: Sea Surface Temperatures
analysed_sst_metadata.long_description: This dataset provides daily estimates of global sea surface temperature (SST) based on observations from multiple satellite sensors. Resolution: 5km. .Available from September 1981 to current. More Information

analysed_sst_anomaly_metadata.name: Sea Surface Temperature Anomalies
analysed_sst_anomaly_metadata.short_description: Daily Sea Surface Temperature Anomaly Estimates
analysed_sst_anomaly_metadata.long_description: This dataset provides daily estimates of global sea surface temperature (SST) based on observations from multiple satellite sensors. Resolution: 5km. .Available from September 1981 to current. More Information

monthly_chlor_a_metadata.name: Ocean Colour - Monthly
monthly_chlor_a_metadata.long_description: This dataset provides global monthly estimates of ocean surface chlorophyll-a concentration and remote sensing reflectance derived from multiple satellite sensors. EOCIS Ocean Colour

monthly_aerosol_metadata.name: Aerosol Optical Depth - Monthly
monthly_aerosol_metadata.short_description: Estimates the thickness of dust and other aerosols in the atmosphere
monthly_aerosol_metadata.long_description: This data set provides observational records of aerosol properties obtained from observations collected by various satellite instruments. Aerosols are minor constituents of the atmosphere by mass, but critical components in terms of impact on climate. Aerosols influence the global radiation balance directly by scattering and absorbing radiation, and indirectly through influencing cloud reflectivity, cloud cover and cloud lifetime. EOCIS Aerosol and Particulate Matter Dataset Information Page
